Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Dizziness \Diz"zi*ness\, n. [AS. dysigness folly. See {Dizzy}.] Giddiness; a whirling sensation in the head; vertigo. [1913 Webster]
dizziness n : a reeling sensation; feeling about to fall [syn: {giddiness}, {lightheadedness}, {vertigo}]
